prompt: Design a luxurious product details page with a deep navy background. Display a large product icon (use Icons.headphones) at the top center in a circular container with a gold border and dark gray background. Below, show the product title 'Premium Wireless Headphones' in bold gold text. Include a 4.5-star rating with gold stars and gray unfilled stars, followed by '(128 reviews)' in light gray text. Show the price '$299.99' in bold gold text, with a crossed-out original price '$399.99' in smaller gray text. Add a detailed description section with multiple paragraphs, in light gray text. Place a quantity selector with circular minus and plus buttons around a number display, styled with a dark gray background and gold icons. End with a full-width gold 'Add to Cart' button. Use a scrollable Column layout with elegant typography and generous spacing for a luxurious feel.
